DEFENSE_CRAFT_ELIMINATED.message: System defense craft eliminated. Incident has been logged.

WEAPONS_EVASIVE_ACTION.message: Weapons discharge detected. Take evasive action!

RONDEL_RESTRICTED_ZONE.message: {playerShipLabel}, this star system is a restricted zone. You must leave within {seconds} seconds. Should you fail to comply, you will be assumed hostile and defensive precautions will be taken.

HOSTILE_ACTION_REPORTED.message: Hostile action reported. Intercept and destroy!
